Reviews.Title: Great for the first 12 months then hard drive had to be replaced
Reviews.Author: D. Harp
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop at Best Buy in May of 2010.  It worked fine until June of 2011 when it started running very slow and then last week I started getting a Windows alert that "SMART failure predicted on hard disk and to replace hard disk asap!"  This was when I realized that no recovery disks came with the computer so I created my own.  Then we bought a new hard disk installed it and tried to install recovery disks.  Still not sure what the problem is but the recovery disk did not restore completely so now I have to order recovery disks from Sony.  You would think having to spend $850 for a laptop that it would last longer than 1 year????????

Reviews.Title: Pretty good laptop
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Arndt "sentient sage"
Reviews.Content: This laptop has been pretty good to me, use it with 32-bit Fedora and Windows 7.  Computer feels very stable and fast, overall very happy with it and would recommend.  Only a couple small gripes:-Headphone plug on front so plugging in speakers runs a cord around the front-Static shock sometimes on space near trackpad, very annoying-USB ports don't have nice feel to them, but they workVery good screen quality, no driver or hardware issues as of yet.  Happy with purchase (got from eLayaway.com).

Reviews.Title: ----------WORST COMPUTER I HAVE EVER OWNED!!!-----------
Reviews.Author: Toka
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for about 8 months and I find myself doing maintenance on it every other day it seems. Didn't experienced these problems with Apple, Dell or Toshiba.  *Have issues with the optical drive from time to time.  *Hard drive has become somewhat noisy which makes me believe it doesn't have much time left.  *Can't let it go to sleep or hibernate without it crashing.

Reviews.Title: Not a great quality
Reviews.Author: Bold Sukhbat
Reviews.Content: Had this for 4 years. Its completely dead now. Motherboard problems started at year 3. Dropped from a ft tall table recently and it cracked open. Thats why its dead now. Before that it was getting slower slower and everyday and it also used to freeze when watching videos. Not a quality product.

Reviews.Title: dissapointing laptop but works
Reviews.Author: GTO
Reviews.Content: Horrible sound nice looking works good screen is ok. Not worth the $699. I paid for it in 2010. Now I used it only a few hours every week or 2 to keep everything up to date. I started using this as my only laptop since the last 8 months as my gateway screen broke as it got dropped. Gateway had a nice sound card was a little slower but I always liked the gateway screen and sound better. I'll never buy a Sony again. Oh and by the way the gateway was a nv series $450.

Reviews.Title: Not much of a durable laptop
Reviews.Author: Alexandre Bodi
Reviews.Content: I bought mine in 2010, and at first it looked pretty good. But as time went by, it started getting slower and slower, with occasional freezing (at the point where I needed to press & hold power button in order to reboot). And I have not installed *any* games whatsoever, nor CAD / heavy rendering software. I've always just used it to surf the web and run torrent client software. It does not have bluetooth, which I kind of miss. It comes with Vaio's "web button", which I never used because it basically sucks. You always end up willing to use other applications when powering on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Lasts 2 years, not impressed at all.
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: I'm going to start by saying I use this computer for school, sometimes for gaming, and just for general use.It seemed like a good computer when I first got it, thought I would try the Intel Core series. The processor was bad. My single core AMD Athlon in my PC is better than this. Not impressed at all. The hard drive? went through 4 of them while it was under the 1 year warranty. After the warranty was up, I purchased an SSD to replace the bad hard drive. I discovered when taking out the old hard drive that sony put in some used P.O.S. hard drive with a repair sticker having someone else's name on it. That really p*ssed me off. It ran good after putting the SSD in, but after about 2 years it would start to blue screen randomly. Not sure what was causing that.. I reinstalled Windows 7, and shortly after that, the screen stopped working. Also, throughout the years, the paint started wearing off everywhere. The computer looks terrible right now. Thats when I gave up and bought an HP EliteBook 6930P. So far, I'm impressed. Great, fast laptop, gets great battery life, incredibly fast, amazing graphics, and one of the most durable laptops I have ever used.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: peggy
Reviews.Content: I have been using it for over 2 years, and I have never faced a problem. I have been using it all day. It looks pretty, it works pretty good. I am very very satisfied! I recommend to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for it's price
Reviews.Author: HM
Reviews.Content: I had bought this laptop in March 2010, and this month it has been exactly 2 years since I had it. I never encountered hard drive failure, dead pixels, memory problems, etc. The only complaint I had in this whole time is that the battery life has dropped but that is expected because any battery depreciates over time and use. I never had the need to upgrade it. I have read other reviews on this laptop and some of them could be prevented by doing the necessary windows updates and Sony vaio care updates. Just like any other machine, it requires maintenance to keep it running at peak levels, just as your car requires an oil change or air filters, this requires maintenance also. My previous Sony Vaio lasted me 6 years and was still functioning when I sold it because I needed to upgrade.I like the chiclet styled keyboard, the screen is very bright. I rate this laptop 9.5/10.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer
Reviews.Author: Katherine Rennecker
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop for almost 3 years and have had absolutely no problems. Battery life is about my only complaint but if you diminish the brightness it gets almost 3 hours of life. It is very easy to use and fast.
